item.title: Animation help
item.dc:creator: @Edu2 Edu2
item.description:
@Edu2 wrote:

You just added it to wrong place I think.
Add it under double TotalExp = 0;
Mine is there and it works fine.

And… I think you shouldn’t make it a 100% chance of healing, but that is just my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Animation help
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

i added guthans to my server worked fine, with the graphic and everything, now it constitly does the graphic insted of only when you actualy attack with the spear, y is this, i know it can be fixed because i had it working before, this is the code im using

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
	{
PkingDelay = 6;
wepdelay = 6;
animation(398, EnemyY, EnemyX);
NewHP += hitDiff;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}
}

Read full topic
